path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - LOOPStarter Smartcontract - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Token contract is vulnerable to sandwich attacks
findings.description: In the swapTokensForEth and addLiquidity functions, since the slippages are not set properly, so this contract may be vulnerable to sandwich attacks.

findings.title: Uninitialized loopsTokenStrategy
findings.description: loopsTokenStrategy should be initialized inside the initialize function instead of the constructor to ensure correct contract initialization logic.

findings.title: LOOPSToken.sol - Unused delegate logic
findings.description: There are some unused code snippets related to the delegation logic in the LOOPSToken contract.

findings.title: Router address doesn't need to be excluded
findings.description: The router address does not need to be excluded from the _excludedFromTax map.
